explanation: Funds are required to fund one Large, Medium-Speed, Roll-on/Roll-off ship, maintenance & operations, and Reserve Sealift Alterations. This is a congressional special interest item.

Funds are transferred from the Operation and Maintenance, Navy, 24/24, appropriation pursuant to subsection (c) and (d) of Title 10 United States code, section 2218 for proper execution. This is a congressional special interest item.
